details: A luxurious suite with a stunning ocean view. Includes a king-sized bed, private balcony, and a spacious bathroom. Perfect for a romantic getaway or a peaceful retreat.
description: Wake up to the sound of waves crashing and enjoy your morning coffee on your private balcony with an unbeatable view of the ocean. This suite offers all the comforts of home with a touch of luxury.

details: Relax in this cozy room overlooking the mountains. Features a queen-sized bed, fireplace, and rustic decor. Ideal for nature lovers and those seeking peace and solitude.
description: Nestled in the heart of the mountains, this room offers the perfect escape. Unwind in front of the fireplace after a day of hiking or simply enjoy the breathtaking mountain views.

details: An elegant suite with modern amenities. Includes a king-sized bed, lounge area, and large bathtub. Ideal for guests who seek comfort and luxury in equal measure.
description: Step into a world of sophistication and comfort. This deluxe suite offers ample space, sleek design, and all the modern amenities you need to feel at home while traveling.

details: Perfect for families. Includes a double bed, two single beds, a mini-fridge, and a spacious bathroom. Comfortable and convenient for families of all sizes.
description: Traveling with your family? This spacious room is designed for your comfort with plenty of space for everyone. Whether you’re enjoying family time in the room or exploring the area, you’ll feel right at home.

details: Designed for business travelers. Features a desk, high-speed internet, king-sized bed, and luxury bathroom. Everything you need to stay productive and comfortable.
description: With a spacious work area, high-speed Wi-Fi, and luxurious amenities, this suite is perfect for the modern professional. Whether you’re working or unwinding, this suite has you covered.

details: A tranquil room with a view of the lush garden. Includes a queen-sized bed, private balcony, and a cozy atmosphere. Perfect for those who want to relax in nature’s embrace.
description: This peaceful room offers a serene escape with its view of the beautiful garden. Perfect for reading, meditation, or simply relaxing after a busy day, the Garden View Room offers a tranquil retreat.
